item.title: 亚洲市场摇摆不定，英伟达业绩超预期后下跌
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市震荡，原因是人工智能风向标英伟达（Nvidia）的盈利井喷被对其中国业务前景的担忧所抵消，而美元则因投资者押注近期降息而保持震荡。【原文：Asian stocks wobbled on Thursday as blowout earnings from artificial intelligence bellwether Nvidia were offset by worries over the outlook for its China business, while the dollar remained shaky as investors bet on a near-term rate cut.】

item.title: 市场权衡美国夏季驾驶结束和印度供应困境，石油下滑
item.description: 油价周四下跌，原因是投资者权衡了夏季驾车季节即将结束时美国燃料需求的前景，同时评估了印度因进口俄罗斯石油而面临美国惩罚性关税的潜在原油供应变化。【原文：Oil prices fell on Thursday as investors weighed the outlook for U.S. fuel demand with the end of the summer driving season near, while assessing potential crude supply shifts as India faces punishing U.S. tariffs for importing Russian oil.】

item.title: 美联储九月减息押注升温，美元处于守势
item.description: 在纽约联储主席约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）发出可能降息的信号后，交易员们加大了对美联储下月降息的押注，美元在周四一开始就走低。【原文：The dollar started Thursday on the back foot as traders added to bets for a Federal Reserve interest rate reduction next month after New York Fed chief John Williams signaled a cut was possible.】

item.title: 全球航空公司集团建议将国际飞行员退休年龄提高至 67 岁
item.description: 一个代表全球航空公司的团体要求联合国航空机构将国际商用飞行员的年龄限制从 65 岁提高到 67 岁，称全球航空旅行的需求正超过飞行员的供应。【原文：A group representing global airlines has asked the U.N.'s aviation agency to raise the international age limit for commercial pilots to 67 years from 65, saying worldwide demand for air travel is outstripping the supply of aviators.】

item.title: 共同社报道：日本贸易谈判代表赤泽取消美国之行
item.description: 据日本共同社周四报道，日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世取消了对美国的访问计划，因为在部长级会谈之前，还有一些问题需要在工作层面上解决。【原文：Japan's top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa canceled a planned visit to the United States as there are some points that need to be addressed at a working level before ministerial talks, Kyodo news agency reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚林纳斯公司（Lynas）年度利润下降超过 90%；将筹资 4.87 亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）周四公布，受卡尔古利（Kalgoorlie）和韦尔德山（Mt Weld）设施扩建折旧的影响，该公司全年利润下降了 90% 以上，同时宣布将进行 7.5 亿澳元（4.8735 亿美元）的股权融资。【原文：Australia's Lynas Rare Earths posted a more than 90% fall in its full-year profit on Thursday, hurt by depreciation from its Kalgoorlie and Mt Weld facility expansion, while announcing an A$750 million ($487.35 million) equity raising.】

item.title: 旅游需求强劲，澳航年度利润超出预期
item.description: 澳大利亚航空公司澳航（Qantas Airways）周四公布的年度基本利润好于预期，原因是其国内和国际航线的旅行需求强劲，预计这种情况将持续到下一个业务年度。【原文：Australian carrier Qantas Airways posted a better-than-expected annual underlying profit on Thursday, driven by robust travel demand across its domestic and international routes, which it expects to continue into the ongoing business year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 South32 公司氧化铝业务强劲，年度利润增长 75
item.description: 澳大利亚多元化矿业公司 South32 周四公布，受主要商品价格上涨和氧化铝业务表现强劲的推动，全年利润激增 75%。【原文：Australian diversified miner South32 reported a 75% surge in full-year profit on Thursday, boosted by higher prices for its key commodities and strong performance at its alumina operations.】

item.title: NetApp 季度收入预期令人失望，股价下跌 6
item.description: 周三，NetApp 预测第二季度营收略高于预期，原因是企业在经济不确定的情况下减少了对云存储服务的支出，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌近 6%。【原文：NetApp forecast second-quarter revenue marginally ahead of estimates on Wednesday, as enterprises soften spending on cloud-based storage services in an uncertain economy, sending its shares down nearly 6% in extended trading.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 NAB 任命 Inder Singh 为首席财务官
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行周四任命英德-辛格（Inder Singh）为集团首席财务官，自 2026 年 3 月起生效。【原文：National Australia Bank appointed Inder Singh as is group chief financial officer on Thursday, effective March 2026.】

item.title: 礼来暂时停止在英国销售减肥药 Mounjaro
item.description: 礼来公司暂时停止了其减肥药 Mounjaro 在英国的发货，因为该药的新涨价方案将于下月开始生效。【原文：Eli Lilly has temporarily paused shipments of its weight-loss drug Mounjaro in the UK, ahead of a new price hike for the treatment set to come into effect starting next month.】

item.title: 巴西大豆种植者与拜耳就种子 "育种奖励 "发生冲突
item.description: 一个代表全国大豆种植者的协会要求巴西反垄断监督机构正式完成对一起案件的审查，该案对一家生物技术公司向其商业伙伴提供 "育种奖励 "的合法性提出了质疑。【原文：An association representing soybean farmers nationwide asked Brazil's antitrust watchdog to formally complete a pending review of a case challenging the legality of "breeding incentives" offered by one biotechnology company to its commercial partners.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯称中国公民不再为五角大楼云提供服务
item.description: 美国国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）周三表示，在得知微软使用中国公民为五角大楼云环境提供服务后，五角大楼已发出正式关注函，他将此称为 "背信弃义"。【原文：U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth on Wednesday said the Pentagon has issued a formal letter of concern after learning that Microsoft was using Chinese nationals to service Pentagon cloud environments, which he described as "a breach of trust."】

item.title: 威斯法默（Wesfarmers）年度利润增长 4%，宣布额外 11 亿美元资本回报
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的非食品零售商威斯法默（Wesfarmers）周四公布，受旗下 Bunnings 和 Kmart 集团业绩强劲的推动，其年度利润增长了近 4%，并宣布将额外返还 17 亿澳元（11.0 亿美元）的资本。【原文：Wesfarmers , Australia's biggest non-food retailer, reported a near 4% rise in its annual profit on Thursday, driven by strong performances in its units Bunnings and Kmart Group, and announced an additional A$1.7 billion ($1.10 billion) capital return.】

item.title: YouTube与福克斯达成短期续约协议以防中断服务
item.description: YouTube 周三表示，它已与福克斯公司达成短期延期协议，以防止在两家公司继续商讨新协议的过程中对 YouTube TV 用户造成干扰。【原文：YouTube said on Wednesday it has reached a short-term extension with Fox to prevent disruption to YouTube TV subscribers as the companies continue to work on a new agreement.】

item.title: 文件显示，黄金储备公司要求取消竞争对手 Elliott 竞购 Citgo 母公司的资格
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件，矿商 Gold Reserve 周三提出申请，要求取消对冲基金 Elliott Investment Management 关联公司的竞标资格，特拉华州法院本月将该公司选为 Citgo Petroleum 母公司拍卖的领跑者。【原文：Miner Gold Reserve on Wednesday filed a motion to disqualify a rival bid from an affiliate of hedge fund Elliott Investment Management that a Delaware court this month selected as frontrunner in an auction for Citgo Petroleum's parent, according to a court document.】

item.title: 贝莱德谴责养老基金管理 "政治化
item.description: 顶级资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周三回击了来自美国共和党和民主党官员的压力，称双方都将政治因素注入了退休资产的管理中，而贝莱德只想履行对客户的信托责任。【原文：Top asset manager BlackRock on Wednesday pushed back against pressure from U.S. Republican and Democratic officials, saying both sides have injected politics into the running of retirement assets and it only seeks to fulfill its fiduciary duties to clients.】

item.title: 交易日 英伟达业绩超预期但股价回落
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，墨西哥将对从中国进口的商品加征关税
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）周三援引三位知情人士的话报道称，作为下个月 2026 年预算提案的一部分，墨西哥政府将提高对中国进口商品（包括汽车、纺织品和塑料制品）的关税。【原文：Mexico's government is set to raise tariffs on Chinese imports, including cars, textiles, and plastics, as part of its 2026 budget proposal next month, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing three people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: VIEW 人工智能风向标英伟达第三季度营收超预期
item.description: 人工智能芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）是 2023 年以来美国股市上涨的主导力量，该公司周三预测第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期。【原文：AI chipmaker Nvidia , the dominating force behind the U.S. stock market rally since 2023, forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌将在弗吉尼亚州再投资 90 亿美元建设人工智能基础设施
item.description: 科技巨头谷歌周三表示，到2026年，它将在弗吉尼亚州追加投资90亿美元，用于云计算和人工智能基础设施建设。【原文：Tech giant Google said on Wednesday it would invest an additional $9 billion in Virginia through 2026 in cloud and AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 新西兰航空公司年度利润降幅低于预期
item.description: 新西兰航空公司周四公布的年度收益降幅小于预期，原因是全球发动机维护问题继续拖累公司业绩，该公司还警告说，2026财年的开局将十分疲软。【原文：Air New Zealand posted a smaller-than-expected fall in annual earnings on Thursday as global engine maintenance issues continued to weigh on the bottom line, and warned of a weak start to the 2026 financial year.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 第三季度收入预期令人失望，股价下跌
item.description: CrowdStrike 周三对第三季度营收的预测令人失望，表明面临经济不确定性的客户支出谨慎。【原文：CrowdStrike forecast for third-quarter revenue disappointed on Wednesday, signaling cautious spending by clients facing economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 人工智能领军企业英伟达预计第三季度营收高于预期
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）周三预计，第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，这主要得益于云计算提供商对其人工智能芯片的强劲需求，这些云计算提供商正在扩建基础设施，以支持生成式人工智能技术。【原文：Nvidia forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, helped by robust demand for its artificial intelligence chips from cloud providers expanding infrastructure to power generative AI technology.】

item.title: 惠普第三季度营收超出预期，得益于人工智能个人电脑的采用和 Windows 11 的升级
item.description: 受人工智能个人电脑需求增长和 Windows 11 升级周期的推动，惠普公司周三公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期。【原文：HP Inc beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, driven by growing demand for artificial intelligence-powered personal computers and Windows 11 upgrade cycle.】

item.title: 雪花公司上调年度产品收入预期，股价上涨
item.description: 雪花公司周三上调了 2026 财年的产品营收预期，这主要得益于企业优先考虑人工智能支出，对其数据分析服务的强劲需求，从而使其股价在盘后交易中上涨了 13%。【原文：Snowflake raised its forecast for fiscal 2026 product revenue on Wednesday, banking on strong demand for its data analytics services, as enterprises prioritize artificial intelligence spending, sending its shares up 13% in extended trading.】

item.title: 生命科学公司安捷伦上调年度收入展望
item.description: 安捷伦科技公司（Agilent Technologies）周三上调了全年营收预期，此前该公司的季度营收超过预期，并押注于实验室研究和药物开发中使用的医疗工具和设备需求的增长。【原文：Agilent Technologies raised its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday after beating quarterly estimates, betting on improving demand for its medical tools and equipment used in lab research and drug development.】

item.title: 分析师称美国对巴西征收关税将重塑全球牛肉贸易流
item.description: 分析师周三表示，美国对巴西征收更高的关税预计将重塑全球牛肉贸易流，引发墨西哥和澳大利亚等国对美国的出货量增加，同时巴西将寻求替代市场。【原文：Higher U.S. tariffs on Brazil are expected to reshape global beef trade flows, sparking increased shipments to the U.S. from countries like Mexico and Australia while Brazil seeks alternative markets, analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Delivery Hero 下调全年调整后息税折旧及摊销前利润（EBITDA）展望，以反映汇率不利因素
item.description: 德国在线外卖食品公司 Delivery Hero 周三将全年调整后未计利息、税项、折旧及摊销前的利润预期下调至 9 亿至 9.4 亿欧元，以反映汇率不利因素。【原文：German online takeaway food company Delivery Hero on Wednesday lowered its full-year adjusted earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortisation outlook to between 900 million and 940 million euros to reflect foreign exchange rate headwinds.】

item.title: Peloton 必须面对股东对流行病后前景的诉讼
item.description: 美国联邦上诉法院周三作出一项有分歧的裁决，称 Peloton Interactive 在 COVID-19 疫情最严重的时候掩盖了其家用健身器材的过剩库存，从而欺骗了股东，Peloton Interactive 必须面对这一诉讼。【原文：Peloton Interactive must face a lawsuit claiming it defrauded shareholders by masking excess inventory of its home exercise equipment as the worst of the COVID-19 pandemic passed, a divided federal appeals court ruled on Wednesday.】
